---
title: "On-Site Inspection Support"
---

## CRA Role During Inspection
- Facilitate document access
- Clarify trial workflows
- Coordinate site staff responses
- Observe inspection process
- Document inspector questions

## CRA Best Practices
- Be factual and objective
- Do not speculate
- Refer to documented evidence
- Escalate questions you cannot answer

## Inspection Logistics
- Inspection room setup
- Document tracking log
- Staff availability schedule
